SEARCH
Package com.example.chicksevent

Class LotteryTest

java.lang.Object
com.example.chicksevent.LotteryTest
public class LotteryTest extends Object
Unit tests for Lottery.

These tests provide a fully synchronous verification of the Lottery.runLottery() logic, ensuring that Firebase interactions occur as expected without relying on real network operations or randomised selections. Firebase Realtime Database calls are mocked using Mockito, and FirebaseDatabase.getInstance(String) is statically replaced to avoid SDK initialisation.

Key Behaviours Verified

  • Correct listener attachment and event handling on entrantLimit and WAITING nodes
  • No writes occur when no waiting entrants exist
  • Atomic update payload correctly includes INVITED entries and deletions from WAITING
  • Ensures that no UNINVITED nodes are created when all entrants fit within the limit

Testing Approach

  • Mocks Firebase structure under /Event and /WaitingList
  • Injects FirebaseService instances using reflection to isolate test behaviour
  • Triggers ValueEventListener.onDataChange(DataSnapshot) manually to simulate database reads
  • Uses ArgumentCaptor to validate the correctness of atomic update payloads

These tests run purely on the JVM and are deterministic â€” no async tasks, randomness, or external Firebase interactions are required.
